frame.name: Version_sequence
frame.definition:
<def-root>An entity goes through several versions, from initial to final.
<ex>This is my <t>first</t> <fex name="Item">draft</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Item
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Item</fen> is one version among several versions (which may or may not yet exist), progressively getting closer to a final version.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The degree of the distance the <fen>Item</fen> is from the final version.
<ex>I warn you, this is a <fex name="deg">very rough</fex> <t>draft</t>.</ex></def-root>
